function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on author expertise may introduce bias in case study selection","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of conservation outcomes and potential solutions","Mitigation":"Use diverse sources and input from experts across different regions and organizations","Technologies":"Data analytics and machine learning for unbiased case study selection","People":"Authors and researchers involved in case study selection","Owner":"Researchers and organizations conducting biodiversity conservation research"},{"Description":"Unverified anticipated outcomes may lead to inaccurate conclusions","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the effects of COVID-19 on conservation sites and species","Mitigation":"Clearly distinguish between known and anticipated outcomes, seek independent verification where possible","Technologies":"Remote sensing and satellite imagery for verification of impacts","People":"Readers and researchers relying on the study's findings","Owner":"Authors and researchers conducting the study"},{"Description":"Limited representation of conservation settings and cultures in case study selection","Impact":"Failure to capture the full range of conservation responses to the pandemic","Mitigation":"Ensure diversity in case study selection, consider input from a wide range of experts and organizations","Technologies":"Virtual reality and immersive technology for remote exploration of conservation settings","People":"Communities and organizations in underrepresented conservation settings","Owner":"Research team and organizations conducting biodiversity conservation research"}]}
